title: Covid Patients Coming Off Ventilators Can Take Weeks to Regain Consciousness
description: A new paper suggests that the combination of the virus and anesthesia plunges the brain into a prolonged state of quiet â€” like a freshwater turtle in winter.
dc:creator: Carl Zimmer

media:content.media:description: Some Covid patients who need ventilators to breathe take weeks to regain consciousness. But they typically make a full recovery with no sign of brain damage.
